CustomField.description: The sum of an employee's rate of basic pay and any basic pay supplement (standard OR special). A basic pay supplement is defined as a regular, fixed supplemental payment (paid in conjunction with base pay) for nonovertime hours of work that is creditable as basic pay for retirement purposes; https://dw.opm.gov/datastandards/dataStandard/1387?index=A
CustomField.label: Adjusted Basic Pay (New)
